column5: **City of Plano tax which is different than TX State Tax is included in rate**  Quiet neighborhood, tastefully decorated 1600 SF condo, lots of windows for sunshine, 1 level-no stairs, convenient to sights, parks/trails, eateries, shops, & DART rail. **You will be the only overnight guest(s) during your stay. Your bedroom/bathroom are across from each other. Your bathroom is private to you while you're here. The only other room on your hallway is the laundry. We love having fellow Toyota friends
column8: Cozy Private Queen Room & Pvt Bath
